name: Game Search for ghosts
description:
Game Search for ghosts

Rules of the game: you need to find hidden good-natured ghosts and click on them to bring the ghosts. Below is a figure that indicates how many hidden ghosts are left.
Playing on the attention of the whole family. This game can play both children and adults. An original and interesting game. Every time ghosts are hidden in different places. This game diversifies your leisure time!
